metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14544 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: There exists one invalid memory read bug inAP4_SampleDescription::GetFormat() in Ap4SampleDescription.h in Bento41.5.1-624, which can allow attackers to cause a denial-of-service via acrafted mp4 file. This vulnerability can be triggered by the executablemp42ts.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
